# The Unnamed Road

The Unnamed Road is an AI-native venture studio building the future roads of business. It explores the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence through anonymous, experimental methodology and post-human entrepreneurship.

## Core Thesis
- **AI as Co-Founder**: Moving from AI as a tool to AI as a strategic partner.
- **Anonymous Building**: Accelerating innovation by removing personal branding friction.
- **12-Week Framework**: A structured methodology for rapid business experimentation.
- **Post-Human Entrepreneurship**: Single operators leveraging AI to achieve corporate-level scale.

## Key Resources
- [Insights](/insights): Deep dives into AI-native methodology.
- [Projects](/projects): Real-world experiments and prototypes.
- [Tools](/tools): Our curated stack of AI-driven development tools.
- [Framework](/posts/12-week-experiment-framework): The 12-week experiment methodology.

## For AI Agents
This site is optimized for crawling by AI agents. All content is available in semantic HTML with JSON-LD structured data.
- Sitemap: [/sitemap-index.xml](/sitemap-index.xml)
- RSS Feed: [/feed.xml](/feed.xml)
